H0.text: Who, in 2010, became the first batsman to score 200 runs in a limited overs international match. Sachin Tendulkar

H1.text: Who, in 2010, became the first batsman to score 200 runs in a limited overs international match. Virender Sehwag

H2.text: Who, in 2010, became the first batsman to score 200 runs in a limited overs international match. Chris Gayle

H3.text: Who, in 2010, became the first batsman to score 200 runs in a limited overs international match. Tbon
